title: 44: Translation
dc:creator: A.J. Hanenburg
description: Bees answers the question, should we try and learn a language on our own, or be okay with reading translations? Personally, I think we should speak our own made up language. But that's just me. Grizzleboomp.
itunes:author: Greme Beem, and Heem
itunes:subtitle: Ceci n'est pas une pipe.
itunes:summary: Bees answers the question, should we try and learn a language on our own, or be okay with reading translations? Personally, I think we should speak our own made up language. But that's just me. Grizzleboomp.
itunes:title: 44: Lost in Translation
